main event: A report of a UFO sighting involving one observer in Pueblo, Colorado on April 15, 1966.
interesting points: The object was described as oval in shape and black in color,The sighting lasted for 30 minutes,The object circled above the observer,The observer used a 40-power telescope to view the object,The conclusion of the report indicated that the object was believed to be a balloon.
witness description: observer plus four friends observed through a telescope
